name: BusinessRegistryEntry
label: business registry entry
definition: entry in a business registry

name: BusinessRegisterIdentifier
label: business register identifier
definition: identifier that uniquely identifies a business register, such as a register identified by the Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation (GLEIF) registration authorities list

name: LegalEntityIdentifierRegistryEntry
definition: entry in a legal entity identifier registry that conforms to ISO 17442 and the Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation (GLEIF) Common Data Format (CDF)
label: legal entity identifier registry entry

name: RegistrationAuthorityCode
label: registration authority code
definition: identifier that uniquely identifies a business registry, and is associated with a registration authority and jurisdiction, issued by the Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation (GLEIF)

name: EntityLegalFormRegistryEntry
label: entity legal form registry entry
definition: entry in an entity legal form registry that conforms to ISO 20275

name: StandardIndustrialClassificationCode
label: standard industrial classification code
definition: the SIC code representing an industry

name: StandardIndustrialClassificationScheme
definition: the scheme defining the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code List
explanatoryNote: Standard Industrial Classifications are four-digit codes that categorize companies by the type of business activities they engage in. These codes were created by the U.S. government in 1937 to facilitate analysis of economic activity across government agencies and within industries. They were mostly replaced in 1997 by a new system of six-digit codes called the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS). The new codes were adopted in part to standardize industry data collection and analysis in between Canada, the United States and Mexico which had entered into the North American Free Trade Agreement. Note that certain organizations, such as the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) still use SIC codes for some purposes.
label: standard industrial classification scheme

name: LocalOperatingUnit
explanatoryNote: LOUs supply registration, renewal and other services, and act as the primary interface for legal entities wishing to obtain an LEI.
definition: registrar that is authorized by the Global LEI Foundation to issue legal entity identifiers
label: local operating unit

name: BusinessRegistry
definition: registry for registering and maintaining information about business entities
label: business registry

name: NorthAmericanIndustryClassificationSystemScheme
definition: the scheme defining the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Codes
label: North American Industry Classification System scheme
explanatoryNote:
The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) is the standard used by Federal statistical agencies in classifying business establishments for the purpose of collecting, analyzing, and publishing statistical data related to the U.S. business economy.

NAICS was developed under the auspices of the Office of Management and Budget (OMB), and adopted in 1997 to replace the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) system. It was developed jointly by the U.S. Economic Classification Policy Committee (ECPC), Statistics Canada and Mexico's Instituto Nacional Estadistica y Geografia, to allow for a high level of comparability in business statistics among the North American countries.

name: EntityExpirationReason
label: entity expiration reason
definition: code for the reason that a legal entity ceased to exist and/or operate

name: BusinessRegistrationAuthority
explanatoryNote: A business registry may include any government-managed registry for registering a business, such as a state department of corporations in the US, as well as other registries such as a local operating unit (LOU) for registration of legal entity identifiers (LEIs). Any sanctioned registration authority as defined by the Registration Authorities List, published by GLEIF, is a business registration authority in this sense.
label: business registration authority
definition: registration authority that is responsible for maintaining a registry of business entities

name: EntityLegalFormRegistry
label: entity legal form registry
definition: registry for registering and maintaining information about the legal forms that are valid for business entities for a particular jurisdiction following the ISO 20275 standard

name: EntityStatus
definition: lifecycle stage indicating the operational and/or legal status of an entity
label: entity status
explanatoryNote: In some jurisdictions, there may be other possible values for entity status, such as suspended in the State of California, thus the individuals provided herein are not intended to be exhaustive.

name: NorthAmericanIndustryClassificationSystemCode
label: North American Industry Classification System code
definition: the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code representing an industry

name: LegalEntityIdentifierRegistry
label: legal entity identifier registry
definition: registry for registering and maintaining information about business entities for a particular jurisdiction

name: RegistrationStatus
label: registration status
definition: lifecycle stage indicating the status of a given registration of something, such as a business or legal entity, as specified by the registration authority
explanatoryNote: There may be other possible values for registration status, depending on the registry, thus the individuals provided herein are not intended to be exhaustive.

name: EntityValidationLevel
definition: code for the level of validation performed by the GLEIF or LOU with respect to the reference data provided by the registrant
label: entity validation level

name: hasRegistryName
label: has registry name
definition: denotes a name for the registry, for example, for a business registry in which a business registration identifier for the legal entity is registered

name: hasEntityExpirationReason
label: has entity expiration reason
definition: indicates the reason that an entity ceased to exist (i.e., disolved, merged with another entity, etc.)

name: hasRegistrationRevisionDate
definition: indicates the date that the status of a specific registration in the registry was revised
label: has registration status revision date

name: PendingArchivalStatus
definition: status indicating that the registration is about to be transferred to a different registration authority, after which its registration status will revert to a non-pending status
label: pending archival status

name: hasValidationLevel
label: has validation level
definition: indicates the level of validation performed by the registrar with respect to the legal entity

name: EntityValidationLevelPartiallyCorroborated
definition: Based on the validation procedures in use by the LOU responsible for the record, the information supplied by the registrant can be partially corroborated by public authoritative sources, while some of the record is dependent upon the information that the registrant submitted, either due to conflicts with authoritative information, or due to data unavailability.
label: entity validation level - partially corroborated

name: AnnulledStatus
definition: status indicating that the registration was determined to be erroneous or invalid after issuance
label: annulled status

name: RetiredStatus
definition: status indicating that the registration is for an entity that has ceased operation, without having been merged into another entity
label: retired status

name: hasRegistrationStatus
label: has registration status
definition: indicates the status of a specific registration, such as for an identifier or license

name: ActiveStatus
definition: status indicating that as of the last report or update, the entity was legally registered and operating
label: active status

name: hasExpiryDate
definition: indicates the date on which something ceases(d) to exist
label: has expiry date

name: hasAutomaticallyTransliteratedLegalName
definition: denotes an auto-generated ASCII-transliterated representation of the legal name for the entity
label: has automatically transliterated legal name

name: EntityValidationLevelFullyCorroborated
definition: Based on the validation procedures in use by the LOU responsible for the record, there is sufficient information contained in authoritative public sources to corroborate the information that the submitter has provided for the record.
label: entity validation level - fully corroborated

name: isSelfMaintained
definition: indicates whether the information about the entity is maintained internally or by a third-party
label: is self-maintained

name: TransferredStatus
label: transferred status
definition: status indicating that the registration that has been transferred to a different registration authority

name: hasRenewalDate
label: has renewal date
definition: indicates the date by which a specific registration in the registry must be renewed or updated

name: hasValidationDate
label: has validation date
definition: indicates the date that a specific registration in the registry was most recently reviewed and validated

name: IssuedStatus
label: issued status
definition: status indicating that the registration has been validated and issued, and which identifies an entity that was operating legally as of the last update

name: hasEntityStatus
label: has entity status
definition: indicates the status of the entity (i.e., active, inactive)

name: hasEntityExpirationDate
label: has entity expiration date
definition: indicates the date on which an entity ceases(d) to exist

name: PendingValidationStatus
label: pending validation status
definition: status indicating that an application for registration has been submitted and is in process, pending validation

name: EntityValidationLevelEntitySuppliedOnly
label: entity validation level - entity-supplied only
definition: Based on the validation procedures in use by the LOU responsible for the record, the information associated with this record has significant reliance on the information that a submitter provided due to the unavailability of corroborating information.

name: LapsedStatus
definition: status indicating that the registration that has not been renewed by the specified renewal date and is not known by public sources to have ceased operation as of the last update
label: lapsed status

name: hasAlternativeLanguageLegalName
label: has alternative language legal name
definition: denotes a registered legal name for the entity in an alternative language used in the legal jurisdiction in which the entity is registered

name: MergedStatus
label: merged status
definition: status indicating that the registration is for an entity that has been merged into another legal entity, such that this legal entity no longer exists as an independently operating entity

name: InactiveStatus
definition: status indicating that the entity is no longer legally registered and/or operating, whether as a result of business closure, acquisition by or merger with another (or new) entity, or determination of illegitimacy
label: inactive status

name: CancelledStatus
label: cancelled status
definition: status indicating that the registration was abandoned prior to issuance

name: PendingTransferStatus
definition: status indicating that the registration has requested transfer to a different registration authority, and for which transfer is in progress
label: pending transfer status

name: hasValidationAuthority
label: has validation authority
definition: identifies the business registration authority for the legal entity, used by the Local Operating Unit (LOU) as the basis for validation, as defined in the GLEIF Registration Authorities List

name: hasInitialRegistrationDate
label: has initial registration date
definition: indicates the date on which an identifier or other registered item was created and/or first registered

name: EntityExpirationReasonDissolved
label: entity expiration reason - disolved
definition: expiration reason indicating that an entity ceased to operate

name: EntityExpirationReasonCorporateAction
label: entity expiration reason - corporate action
definition: expiration reason indicating that an entity was acquired or merged with another entity

name: DuplicateStatus
label: duplicate status
definition: status indicating that the registration was determined to be a duplicate registration of the same entity as another registration; duplicate status is assigned to the non-surviving registration (i.e. the identifier that should no longer be used)

name: hasTransliteratedLegalName
definition: denotes an optional ASCII-transliterated (i.e. Latin- or Romanized) representation of the legal name for the entity
label: has transliterated legal name

name: hasPriorLegalName
label: has prior legal name
definition: denotes a primary legal name that was used previously for the entity

name: EntityExpirationReasonOther
definition: expiration reason indicating something that is neither due to disolution nor corporate action
label: entity expiration reason - other

name: hasTradingOrOperationalName
definition: denotes a 'trading as', 'brand name', 'doing business as', or 'operating under' name currently used by the entity in addition to, but not replacing, the (primary) legal, official registered name
label: has trading or operational name

name: hasPreferredTransliteratedLegalName
label: has preferred transliterated legal name
definition: denotes a preferred ASCII-transliterated representation of the legal name for the entity
